title: Chicago
writer: Bill Condon, Bob Fosse, Fred Ebb
short_cast: Renée Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, Queen Latifah, John C. Reilly, Christine Baranski, Taye Diggs, Dominic West, Lucy Liu, Denise Faye, Colm Feore, Deidre Goodwin, Mya, Susan Misner, Ekaterina Chtchelkanova

desc: Bored homemaker Roxie Hart dreams of being famous, but her ambitions land her in jail. Good thing she has a lawyer who can turn felony into infamy.
